page.title: 02WHERE PEOPLE LIVE IN CARLTON
page.content: About{one twelfth}of our block is houses and built up areas.These are the{villages of Wallingwells,Letwell and{Carlton-in-Lindrick.}Each of these villages has a variety of{semi- {detached,detached,semi-bungalows, {bungalows}and{terrace houses.}The most popular houses built in our block are {semi-detached}because they are cheaper and easier to build.The largest built up area is{Carlton-in-Lindrick}because more people live there and there are more facilities.{Wallingwells Hall and some other old buildings are being renovated but none have been knocked down.Susan lives in Letwell and her house is the{'New Rectory'.}It is a {detached}house.It is built in the {orchard}of the{'Old Rectory'.}There are three groups of{old peoples houses in{Carlton-in-Lindrick}and none in {Letwell and Wallingwells.
